comments.body: nit: a map to a map can be cumbersome, we can come back to this later with an actual type.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +42,46 @@	PolicyName    string                       `json:"policyName"`
	DefaultCPUSet string                       `json:"defaultCpuSet"`
	Entries       map[string]map[string]string `json:"entries,omitempty"`
	Checksum      checksum.Checksum            `json:"checksum"`
}
